thread.title: 19 Times Scottish Celebrities Were Savage AF
thread.title_full: 19 Times Scottish Celebrities Were Savage AF

author: Hilary Mitchell
title: 19 Times Scottish Celebrities Were Savage AF
text:
She might be the queen of daytime telly, but she’s still Scottish, and she still knows a numpty when she sees one. ID: 10543280 18. When James McAvoy pulled this evil prank . View this image ›
buzzfeedau.tumblr.com What. The. Fuck.
ID: 10543544 19. And when Ewan was a tiny bit miffed at Boris Johnson’s post-Brexit resignation. View this image ›
Twitter: @mcgregor_ewan Boris: “Oh look! Ewan McGregor’s tweeted me! I’m such a big fan of…oh.” *cries*
ID: 10542396 In short, don’t mess with Scottish celebrities. View this image ›
CBS / Giphy You’ll seriously regret it if you do.
ID: 10543226 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
 More News About Craig Ferguson Hilary Mitchell is the Scotland editor for BuzzFeed and is based in Edinburgh.
